query: WITH entities AS (SELECT collateralization_ratio, id FROM loans WHERE ((collateralization_ratio IS NOT DISTINCT FROM $3) AND COALESCE(id < $2, true) OR COALESCE(collateralization_ratio < $3, collateralization_ratio IS NOT NULL)) ORDER BY collateralization_ratio DESC NULLS LAST, id DESC LIMIT $1) SELECT i.id AS "entity_id: LoanId", e.sequence, e.event, e.recorded_at FROM entities i JOIN loan_events e ON i.id = e.id ORDER BY i.collateralization_ratio desc nulls last, i.id desc, i.id, e.sequence
